1.text: Do not rinse the rice before you cook it.

2.text: Consider letting the rice soak in a pot of water before you cook it.
2.vid: /c/c4/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 4 Version 5.360p.mp4

3.text: Fill a large pot with 2 cups (450 milliliters) of water and add a few extra tablespoons of water.

4.text: Add 1 ½ cups (300 grams) of short-grain rice or 1 cup (200 grams) of medium or long-grain rice.
4.vid: /d/d0/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 6 Version 5.360p.mp4

5.text: Bring the water to a boil over high heat.

6.text: Reduce the heat once the water is boiling, and let the rice simmer for 10 minutes.
6.vid: /3/30/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 8 Version 5.360p.mp4

7.text: Turn the heat off once the rice has absorbed all of the water.
7.vid: /3/3b/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 9 Version 5.360p.mp4

8.text: Leave the pot, covered, on the stove for 10 more minutes.

11.text: Bring 2 cups (450 milliliters) of water to a boil in a large pot.
11.vid: /a/ab/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 13 Version 5.360p.mp4

12.text: Add 1 ½ cups (300 grams) of short-grain rice or 1 cup (200 grams) of medium-grain rice.
12.vid: /8/80/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 14 Version 5.360p.mp4

13.text: Cover the pot with a lid and simmer for 15 minutes.

14.text: Combine 4 tablespoons of rice vinegar, 2 tablespoons of sugar, and 1 teaspoon of salt in a small saucepan.
14.vid: /4/49/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 16 Version 4.360p.mp4

15.text: Bring the sushi rice seasoning to a boil over medium heat.
15.vid: /1/1a/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 17 Version 4.360p.mp4

16.text: Remove the seasoning from the stove.

17.text: Transfer the rice to a glass bowl.

18.text: Pour the seasoning over the rice.
18.vid: /0/05/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 20 Version 4.360p.mp4

19.text: Mix the rice and the seasoning together with a paddle.
19.vid: /3/34/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 21 Version 5.360p.mp4

20.text: Serve the rice while it is still warm.

21.text: Fill a large pot with 2 cups (450 milliliters) of water and bring it to a boil.

22.text: Add 1 ½ cups (300 grams) of short-grain rice or 1 cup (200 grams) of medium-grain rice.
22.vid: /6/63/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 24 Version 5.360p.mp4

23.text: Cover the pot with a lid and simmer for 15 to 20 minutes.
23.vid: /f/f7/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 25 Version 4.360p.mp4

24.text: In another pot, combine 1 ½ cups (337.50 milliliters) of coconut milk, 1 cup (225 grams) of white sugar, and 1/2 teaspoon salt.
24.vid: /e/ee/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 26 Version 4.360p.mp4

25.text: Bring the coconut milk mixture to a boil over medium heat.
25.vid: /9/9b/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 27 Version 5.360p.mp4

26.text: Stir the coconut milk mixture into the rice once the rice is done cooking.
26.vid: /6/6b/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 28 Version 5.360p.mp4

27.text: Set the seasoned rice aside for one hour.

28.text: Combine ½ cup (112.50 milliliters) of coconut milk, 1 tablespoon of sugar, ¼ teaspoon of salt, and 1 tablespoon of tapioca starch in a saucepan.
28.vid: /c/c5/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 30 Version 4.360p.mp4

29.text: Bring the sauce to a boil.
29.vid: /c/c7/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 31 Version 4.360p.mp4

31.text: Scoop the rice onto four plates.

33.text: Drizzle the sauce over the mangoes and rice.
33.vid: /5/59/Make Sticky Rice Using Regular Rice Step 35 Version 4.360p.mp4

34.text: Know what to expect from these recipes.
